website_summaries.verdict: A good, lightly armored pair of gloves for protection of important areas on the hand.
pros: Lightweight rubber padding covers key joints such as the knuckles
Protects hands from minor crashes and typical bumps and scrapes
Lighter armor makes it easier to manipulate the digits
cons: Gloves lack the proper protection for extreme or dangerous activities

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, comfy. Protective when I wiped out on a moped on wet road. Wish they were available in a small as the medium is just a little too big and is therefore fine for riding but prohibitive for fine motor tasks.
customer_reviews.author: fro3730

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, fit as advertised, great grip and ventilation
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, honestly I think I like them better than the Wiley X gloves I'm replacing! Comfortable, fitted grip with good ventilation and dexterity. One month in and they are holding up well. I'll update my review once they' been put through the paces a bit more but definitely liking my first impressions. UPDATE DEC 2018: AWESOME! They still fit and feel great, haven't worn out, keep my hands ventilated enough during warm days and now that I've been out and about in cold weather, I still love them. Very true to sizing on the product page, and very good dexterity even while wearing them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin V.

customer_reviews.title: not a happy camper...but so close
customer_reviews.text: Man...no fun leaving a bad review. For the money, these gloves lasted less than a month. Already have a hole on the outside of the thumb....rendering the gloves pretty useless. Gloves should cover your hands and fingers right? To bad. I really like the fit as well as the warmth they provide. I wore them most of the month but, should have lasted longer. I would have returned them until I realized they fell apart just outside of the return window. Does anyone sell gloves that are designed to last? I've been through to many gloves at this point. Not the happiest of campers.
customer_reviews.author: Survival Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Definitely A Well Investment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of gloves! I use mine for when I ride my motorcycle and they are more than comfortable. More than enough padding but not too much that it gets in the way or becomes uncomfortable after wearing for an excessive amount of time. They do keep my hands nice and warm on those cold night trips home during the summer, not sure how well they perform in the fall months. I will update this review when I have tested them out more!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Beard

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! Worn for motorcycle riding in cool weather. I am women's size L in gloves and I got a medium. They are a little big but otherwise fit very nicely. Very comfortable. The knuckles aren't hard, but rather a firm soft, if that makes sense. They protect but definitely wouldn't be able to hurt anyone if I got in a brawl. (Housewives and brawls go hand-in-hand, you know.) My kids call them my "murder" gloves because they look tough. Apparently though, not tough enough for them to think I'm cool.....
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ann B

customer_reviews.title: Too Late Now
customer_reviews.text: Outside of the return window and really unhappy I didn't catch this sooner. Bought as a set of backup / spare gloves. Now that my original gloves are on the way out I put them on to find that the thumbs are almost as long as the index fingers? Never seen a pair of hands that these would fit on, but I can rest easy that they were an expensive waste of time and money. Not sure this wasn't just a QC check issue here but pretty sure I am throwing these out.
customer_reviews.author: PASSTHEAMMO

customer_reviews.title: Hard knuckle no longer available
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these months ago that came with a hard, reinforced knuckle. I lost one of the gloves so I decided to reorder using the reorder functionality only to find out that the product has changed, the hard knuckle has been replaced by a rubber knuckle. Really disappointing. I now see the description that was added that they replaced the hard knuckle with a rubber knuckle because the hard knuckle was dangerous...which is exactly the reason I wanted the hard knuckle.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mozealous

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to feel Bad@$$ in these knuckle wrappers!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves automatically make you feel bad@$$ the moment you put them on. These are advertised as military gloves but can honestly be used for anything from motorcycle to construction to paintball. Pro: -Durable and quality material -Breathable - especially with the air vents -Flexible and comfortable - can wear for hours -Hard knuckle useful for saving your knuckles from street fights and everything else lol -lasts forever - well worth the investment Cons: -Not touch screen sensitive
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for all sorts of work; Motorcycling, manual labor, paintball
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. They have saved my hands on three different occasions from crashes/slide outs. Sliding on your palms over 20 feet of asphalt and finding not only are your hands uninjured and unchafed, but your gloves are also totally intact, is fantastic. I also use them for any work I might have to do, whether is involves chemicals or manual labor, or protecting my fingers and knuckles while playing paintball.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Put them on last night for a bike ride and they fit perfectly. I had on a long sleeve warm shirt which after a couple hours I started to feel the cold through the arm, but my hands stayed comfortable. Not hot, just comfortable. Although, I do not recommend for extreme cold weather gloves such as snow...not sure they would keep your hands warm in that. They feel tough and rugged which I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Waterdog

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality - Sizes run a bit small though.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product of outstanding quality, first and foremost. The design is great, using sturdy materials that do not inhibit movement. The item came exactly as pictured and described. They shipped and arrived on-time, too. That being said, the one thing to be aware of is the fact that the sizing runs a bit on the small side. I have small to average sized hands for a man, and ordered a large after reading reviews; they were the right fit. All in all, I'm a fan. I would buy another pair from this seller, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Christian Angle

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son who was deploying!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Military son that was deploying, son they (gloves) were definitely put to the ultimate test!! They held up well, he said they fit well and were comfortable. Well made , worth the money. He lent them to a battle buddy and he liked them so much he kept them!! He recommended them to all of his buddies. Well worth the money. Both gloves and soldiers made it back in one piece! Will buy again in near future.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Go with your normal glove size
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers said these run large so order the medium. I don’t have especially large hands but couldn’t even force the mediums on. They do fit my girlfriend well, and she’s not a big girl. And that’s all I got to say about what size to order. They seem well made but I should have ordered large.
customer_reviews.author: John Annesley

customer_reviews.title: Glove itself held up fine, but the Velcro is completely shot and constantly ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had them for over a year now. Glove itself held up fine, but the Velcro is completely shot and constantly comes undone to the point I need to buy new gloves. Not bad for the price, but if you're looking for long term i'd suggest something else. I work in Law Enforcement so would use them on a regular bases for searching. They are a medium warmth and work good for spring or fall, but MN winters are way to harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Versatile gloves
customer_reviews.text: Few times are 5-star reviews really worth the 5 stars. These gloves are really comfortable. They have a wrist slip that allows you to tighten it so the won’t slip off. Good grip on the palm side and the knuckle guard is a good addition. I think these would be great for airsoft, cycling, and even gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Chia Seed

customer_reviews.title: The gloves fit very snug and feel great. They feel great on my hands and are ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to start with the positive. The gloves fit very snug and feel great. They feel great on my hands and are incredibly comfortable. On the downside the gloves knuckles are very soft. I thought they would be harder plastic but they're actually not it was kinda misleading in my opinion. The Velcro is not great quality in my opinion. I feel after taking the gloves off a few times the Velcro may seperate or tear and affect the quality of its purpose. I went with 3 stars instead of a 1 or 2 star review because of how comfortable they are on my hands. For the price overall, not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Strong protection to hands
customer_reviews.text: Feels comfortable, knuckles are hard to protect. Does’t have touch screen. Velcro to tighten the glove is good to keep gloves in place. Go with a size smaller ashey are big in size. It was mentioned that not for motorcycle riding but I am using these while riding the motorcycle and it feels safe while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Great product and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for a friend for Christmas who is an avid rider and he was extatic about them. They fit perfectly (or as expected/true to the size he already wears). He loved that they had the hard pieces around the knuckles for extra protection and that the gloves were vented. We live in Arizona so obviously it's hot here a good part of the year so having vented gloves was pretty cool because he didn't have that on his current pair. He wanted to know where I got them so he could buy more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: somsas

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't ask for a better glove. These are exacly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't ask for a better glove. These are exacly what I wanted. They look badass and fit perfectly. Width of my hand was around 8-8.5 inches and I have longer, thinner fingers. I ordered the medium which fit perfectly. I took them out on a trail right away and wore them while using a machete to chop brush. The gloves gave no wear. I could also tell the vent holes helped with keeping the heat down. Also handling firearms with them give a better feel than bare hands. I would definately recommend these, especially since they cost at least half as much as other gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hardgrove

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. They fit well (something I struggle with because my fingers are very long), are made of very good quality material, and the knuckles aren’t uncomfortable at all. They’re not warm enough for extremely cold weather, but well suited for lower temperatures than I would have thought. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome motorcycle gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves for my husband for when he rides his motorcycle, and they worked out great! The material is durable, the little vents are convenient, and the fact that they work with touchscreens definitely comes in handy. They are also true to size. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria

customer_reviews.title: Solid gloves for the price, palm is thin but fits well
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good fitting gloves, probably not the best choice for overall protection of your hands as the palm leather is fairly thin and would shred relatively easily in a skid incident, but far better than nothing and it is a trade off to make for comfort and fit. Overall good gloves for the price, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Use them year around
customer_reviews.text: Well made gloves. Went through 3 pairs of those in about a year of daily use (they are good but not indestructible). Combination of leather and synthetic, breathable - wear them in 80-85 F. Ordered my usual glove size, fit perfectly. Don't come apart at the seams, but subject to wear and tear. Good grip. Work on the phone's touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Werehamster

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Thought I lost my previous pair so I bought a new pair. My new pair’s fabric is getting caught in the Velcro and it’s pulling the fabric out. Not too happy about that. Still great gloves though. So far they’re a 5/5 for me. They’re a bit stiff so bending fingers isn’t too easy, other than that they look like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love them. When these give out I’ll get another pair.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, rugged, great dexterity and able to at the very least answer my phone with them. Holding up well after several months of use. My only concern is the D ring that constrains the hook and loop fastener to the wrist. Hasn’t given out yet, but the wrist strap can become twisted kind of easily. Just something I’m keeping my eye on. Only happens to one glove.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are honestly perfect, I use them all the time when I go airsoft and they are strong and very flexible with included touch screen fingertips. Easy to pull triggers and are made with great stitching, I've even washed them once. These are some nice tactical gloves. Just make sure you get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Strong gloves
customer_reviews.text: These tactical gloves are made of strong material. I purchased them for my husband who plays paintball & he really likes them. They can be adjusted to fit on his large wrists but are flexible enough for him to maneuver his fingers.
customer_reviews.author: KristaDD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Military Duty
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for the money. I've taken them out into the field a few times (in the Army), and aside from some aesthetic deterioration, the gloves still work great! Kevlar knuckles are perfect and the gloves are much better than the standard issue combat gloves in regards to actually fitting, feeling comfortable, and being functional in regards to still letting you use your hand and fingers.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Near Custom Fit
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart most companies post for their gloves are very inaccurate but not these. They fit my hand shape very well. The finger length on the individual fingers is almost perfect except for the ring finger. Now I doubt this will be true for others but its close to a custom glove. The strap system is nice and the palms are good.
customer_reviews.author: james tonkinson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, seam coming apart
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I was excited to receive these. I even ordered a second pair after seeing how well they fit and felt. Well after first time I had to get cuffs on someone who didn't want to be cuffed, I have a place where the stitching came out. Where the palm area meets the wrist on the left hand the seam came apart a little over an inch wide. I'm disappointed in this. I haven't contacted anyone yet, that is my next step.
customer_reviews.author: David Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very good gloves for average motorcycling , for long rides look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: Very good gloves for the price. So far I have used them on my Harley for 1000 miles(50-100 mile trips) and 3 months , they are still looking good and new, no signs of wear yet. they are ok for Summer and spring otherwise cold below 50 degrees. The velcro tie at wrist is very good, I like it as it holds glove in place. They do take little time to break in, still they'll not be 100% comfortable but for 50-100 mile rides they are perfect. If you are price conscious and need decent glove too, then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: N. sharma

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are pretty cool looking but not exactly not great for using on a street bike. I would say they're maybe good for working in the yard or something. They have knuckle protection but it's not as tough as the ones you'd buy in a motorcycle store. The whole glove is kinda "soft" for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Luke D Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I picked up the finger-less gloves, but writing my review here. Love the fit and finish on these gloves. The wrist strap is an added bonus for sure. I thought I read one reviewer thought they were too small, but mine were a perfect fit. I like the reinforced knuckle areas, but don't plan on punching anyone out or going through walls. However, if need be...I'll be there. Awesome gloves Freetoo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect much for a $22 pair of gloves but first impression is that they are excellent. I will be using these primarily for riding my dirt bike. Grabbing another pair for work on the farm. Great fit, great stitching, good quality materials, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: They were better than expected and they perform well while I operate my motorcycle. The wrist strap is fully adjustable which makes it awesome! It fits perfect. I have medium hands and it does fit like a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Rho Main

customer_reviews.title: Overall, Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a Deputy Sheriff on road patrol and my work requires a lot of hands-on. These gloves are very comfortable, lightweight, and very durable. Only dislike is I ordered a medium, when I needed a large. I tried the size chart and I figured a medium would work since I don’t need a baggy set. The gloves are being stretched out so they are working as expected. Just a heads up, order a size up bc they run small!
customer_reviews.author: B. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: If you have sensitive skin, dont get these
customer_reviews.text: They are alright. Warm but no more than usual. I'm only taking away stars because it turns out that I'm allergic to one of the MANY materials in the gloves. They made my hands swell up. When the swelling finally went down, I had (have) these dark rough blotches along my fingers. Other than that, they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that these were going to be awful, just based on how cheap they are. They are pretty great though. Good grip, and they feel solid. The knuckles and reinforcements are just hard plastic but you shouldn't expect metal/carbon fiber at this price point, and hard plastic will still save you from having your hand bits left as a smear on the pavement if you go down at high speed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first due to the low price point, but after taking them out a couple times I really like them. Great quality, fits my hand extremely well, and still allows good trigger feel. I would highly recommend these to anyone who's on the fence about them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Weir

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to wear with my winters.
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality and well built. They feel fine with inserts. They don't work with your phone if you care about that. They have handled the beating of crawling on the ground during movement drills and ambush/recon drills well. I can shoot with them on just fine but I have small hands so your mileage may vary. The straps are durable, but bad if you need to take them off quickly. With practice you can get faster at taking them off. If you're just using these for a bike or daily work gloves these will definitely stand up to that.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: I usually wear medium gloves and they usually fit nicely but these are even better
customer_reviews.text: Mine came exactly how the picture is shown. It also was sold by FREETOO and thats what it says on the glove. I usually wear medium gloves and they usually fit nicely but these are even better. I must have short thumbs or most glove companies think the world has long thumbs because most of the time the thumb part of the glove us too long, BUT these fit BEAUTIFULLY! They stretch enough but not too much and they are super comfortable. Very easy to maneuver in. Buy these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Brock S.

customer_reviews.title: Tactical gloves!
customer_reviews.text: good solid gloves for the price, thicker than I would have though but good gloves especially for the price. Not really plastic on the knuckles but more like a thick pad with plastic underneath. I use it for riding a motorcycle. If you wanted to use them for something requiring some dexterity it might be a bit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: TheSage

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eyes on these gloves for a while, and when i bought my motorcycle I bought a pair. Good breathable gloves for Summer. They were a little tight at first but stretched out to fit very nicely. I've had these for almost a year of riding, on and off road, and they've held up nicely. I would definitely buy another pair if I ever ruin my current ones.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great design! Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good and tight. I love the strap around the wrist. The male portion of the velcro is really crappy. It worked fine at first but wears out quickly. The stitching is poor and the seams are starting to rip. They are very sensitive to heat and the nylon on one finger tip melted the second it touched the rocker cover on my bike so there not good for engine work. I have worn these gloves everyday for 3 months. I love the glove but the quality isnt there.
customer_reviews.author: Shinerdude

customer_reviews.title: They feel great, are tactile enough for my hands
customer_reviews.text: The slight tears on my gloves are indicative of how these things have saved my hands as I fell a few times while learning how to ride. They feel great, are tactile enough for my hands, and are definitely strong enough to handle sliding on pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Decent. Depends on purpose
customer_reviews.text: The fit was not bad. The strap around the wrist keeps a little more warmth in. These gloves do not keep you warm. The knuckles breath and the material flexes allowing wind straight through.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: bought for fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. bought them for working with brush in yard. Knuckle guards in particular, as well as playing with dog (skin not as tough and thick as younger man)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You look like bat man
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to get off and on, also I do feel that my knuckles are protected very well, could also probably get in a fight and my hands would be all right. But very cold when riding at night between fingers, and the fingertips got very pilly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dad loved them so much I gave him my pair and ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to have full coverage gloves to take my motorcycle class so I ordered these. The medium fit my hands but we're about an inch longer then my fingers but I'm sure it's because I'm a woman. However it did not affect my driving or handling at all. My dad loved them so much I gave him my pair and ordered the fingerless pair for myself. Very happy with these gloves and a great deal as far as pricing goes.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: I like how they are rough and sturdy and helps me ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves came quickly and in their own little pouch. I read a lot of reviews saying to go up a size, but if you are a female I would stick to the size chart. I'm a female and I got a size up and they're a little big on the fingers but the wrist space is small even for my hands. I like how they are rough and sturdy and helps me do yard work like moving logs without wearing down my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Yarelis Colon

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves and customer service
customer_reviews.text: .I had purchased a similar version before and have been satisfied. This one looks slightly different but feels feels snug and would make a great yard/ landscaping gloves like my prior gloves. I did run across an issue but the folks at TPRANCE made it all right. Quick and great customer service. I'm a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: @nJ!0

customer_reviews.title: They come in handy where I work.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for work, these gloves are great for where I work since I have to use a box cutter at my job and we sometimes work with glass so this minimizes cuts if my hands were to get a cut, them gloves are like armor which will come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Phillips

customer_reviews.title: They're really nice but I got Medium and they're just a tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: They're really nice but I got Medium and they're just a tiny bit too tight to the point where I know I won't enjoy them. Ordering a LARGE soon. (If you're a dude I don't suggest going Medium with these gloves. Keep it LARGE at a minimum lol.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves for Sports or M/C Riding.
customer_reviews.text: Your hands will stay nice and warm and you don't lose Tactile Feel for picking up tools etc. I got these to use while Skeet Shooting. Descent quality gloves for the price. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Guitartek

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves I’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: Best gloves I’ve owned. U name it and I used it for that. Very comfortable and nice
customer_reviews.author: Angel Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: very good safety gloves
customer_reviews.text: I ordered those safety gloves when I went to a motorcycle class . First I've got them in medium size and realized that they are pretty tight to me send them back and ordered a large size . Large fit well to my hands , very comfortable. Have been using then already for a year .
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice and snuggly.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit perfectly and they are super comfortable. I have been using them for 3 months now and they are ok. I just started to notice some tears. I wanted to inquiry about any possible warranty but I might just try a different brand for a couple of days and if i am not happy I'll come back and buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: purchased these for when i go shooting and for work, they are comfortable and warm. They do what they are intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: Konigtiger

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I use these almost every day, super durable and great for protection. They dont work too well in the touch screen part especially for iphones, but otherwise theyre good.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cella

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for riding gloves and have been good so far. Not too hot in summer and I've been wearing them for shorter rides to work at 50 degree temps.
customer_reviews.author: Tim0

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but don't last.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but the seams are already coming apart after a few months of normal wear. I use these for motorcycle gloves so it makes me a little skeptical about how much protection they would provide in an accident.
customer_reviews.author: M. W. Albritton

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Just got them yesterday and used it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Just got them yesterday and used it for work. I know some of you used it for motorcycle, but I used mine in workplace environment and it's really nice and comfortable because it grips to anything I grab and held for longest.
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality gloves. I use them outside for tactical use and they protect my hands while keeping them warm. Only wish they could offer smaller sizes. I order the smallest size and they fit alright, but I would have wanted them to be more snug. Other than that, great gloves. EDIT: I washed and dried the gloves and they shrank a little. The fingers are now more snug and a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping they would last longer. So they sent another pair.
customer_reviews.text: So I been using these every day for work for about 6+ months. They started to wear on the palm. The fingers started to go after at the 4th month. I had to tape it to prevent it from ripping more. I don't know the average life of a set of gloves but I was hoping to get another 6 months out of it. Edit:Sent a 2nd pair. Efficient Customer service. Here's hoping they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Wiley's gloves do hold up. They can be quite uncomfortable. They push on the bottom of my fingers or the top of my palm. The stitching on the inside starts to get very uncomfortable as well. These were the number one rated gloves online on a couple sites that I found so I ordered them. I will never order a cheap pair of motorcycle gloves again. Do yourself a favor and go get the alpinestars.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D

customer_reviews.title: Med is perfect size for me
customer_reviews.text: Med is perfect size for me, as a woman who doesn't have 'dainty' hands. Hard knuckle area seems very sturdy & overall construction of the gloves appears to be good quality. No loose bits, tears or dangling threads. Was able to operate my smartphone while wearing them, too...so that's a plus. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Halibug

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good protection.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as motorcycle gloves. These look and feel good on the hand. Were a little tighter than I had expected. But all in all good. Good protection from cold weather. Can ride 5-10 miles in 50-55 degree F temperature, before hands start feeling too cold.
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh Koul

customer_reviews.title: Fits my hands well
customer_reviews.text: I have smaller hands and these are the only gloves I have ever owned that have fit my hands correctly.
customer_reviews.author: unrealdx

customer_reviews.title: The straps to tighten are a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Overall I do like the feel of the gloves. They are not for cooler weather. the straps is the only thing I would change.. having to fumble with those thin straps after you take your helmet off is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit well. I have fairly small hands and ordered the smallest size available. Very breathable. Love the secure fastening and the armored knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable price for amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am in the military and constantly go through tactical gloves while training, but these gloves are everthing I need for less than half the price I usually spend for the ones that are sold on post. Very happy with purchase and look forward to sending anyone that needs them to buy FREETOO.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo D. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: They have been solid gloves that are fairly comfortable. I thought that the knuckle grips would have something rigid in there to protect your hand more in case of a fall but the padding is just thicker there are a slightly different material.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves look and feel really good although slightly larger than I was expecting. According to the measurements, the M should have been just right but the fingers were a little long and bit roomier than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: J. Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for the price. Used these on a weekend bike ride to Eureka Springs Arkansas this past weekend. They feel good, solid straps, good ventilation without getting too cool at night. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pezant

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I purchased medium, are run too big for me...... if they fit it would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: This is a good fitted pair of emergency
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fitted pair of emergency, bug out, operational gloves. Good to have in emergency situations. This is a pair of all purpose extreme gloves. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rico4USA

customer_reviews.title: Great For A Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these back in Feb 2018 and they've lasted until January 2019. I used them moderately often (daily during 40-60F weather in NYC, so about 150 days a year.) They were comfortable and easy to use, but don't expect them to last longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Expected them to be subpar fir the kitchen, but actually comfortable. I wish they came is a small size.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Another layer of skin
customer_reviews.text: Not a winter glove. Fabric over the fingers is thin enough to feel through, which is the idea. You can use these gloves for a lot of bare hands uses where touch is important. I'm not sure when my knuckles need protection but if anybody needs a cold cocking haymaker I'm ready to do it.
customer_reviews.author: S. McQuinn

customer_reviews.title: Affortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to ride my motorcycle. They fit really well specially at the bottom of my fingers near knuckles.(snug). Really like that the Velcro strap loops all the way around wrist and add support
customer_reviews.author: adan castillo

customer_reviews.title: FREETOO Tactical Gloves Military Rubber Hard Knuckle Outdoor Gloves
customer_reviews.text: werent what I was expected and returned them but they are a well made product thanks anyway
customer_reviews.author: NormaRae

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get this for a motorcycle! If you fall ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get this for a motorcycle! If you fall they will not protect your hand. I use them for yard work or snow blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great product high quality
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice. Great quality. I ordered the smallest and they are little big.
customer_reviews.author: jstfcknme

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great breathable and durable gloves. Definitely want to go with a different option. If you are looking for warmth of water proofness.
customer_reviews.author: Phteven

customer_reviews.title: Not a solid knuckle.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in second purchase. The first time I purchased a year or so ago these were 5 star gloves. Hard knuckles and well made glove. Not any more. The knuckles are just a tougher fabric than the rest of the glove. The knuckles bend and give and provide less strength and protection. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt Dunigan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality is above par
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these gloves are great and the size fitted as expected. Great gloves for working in a shop or paintballing on your spare time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Piccone

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months and don’t even use it every day and they already opening. Not holding
customer_reviews.author: alfredo skelton

customer_reviews.title: Not Great.
customer_reviews.text: I was unfortunately very disappointed in this product. I purchased them for some construction work and they gave out after the first two days on the job. Holes in the fingers and just overall trashed after a little work. I can see them being useful for light gardening, but even then I doubt they would hold up long. They are not advertised properly for what there actually capable of.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Not warm but feels strong.
customer_reviews.text: Dont keep ya hands warm but they do feel tight to harm ones soul.
customer_reviews.author: felisia

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably - The holes in the knuckles are really nice and let plenty of cool air when you are riding around on your motorcycle on hot days. Also they keep heat in well when it is cold. Protect my hands well I would feel confident that they would block road rash.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Dependable An well made
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves owned them for awhile now an they’ve held up for my training an drills.
customer_reviews.author: Connorcb

customer_reviews.title: Really cool gloves I've bought 4 of these
customer_reviews.text: Really cool gloves I've bought 4 of these. Not because they rip but because 2 I used for warehouse work and the other 2 I keep them in my bag packs. Only down side is they will not keep your fingers warm during the winter. Beside that they are awsome
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: A good pair of gloves for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves for the price, I thought the knuckle protector was hard shell like the one I had ordered a few months ago.. I recieved soft shell ones, but overall good gloves. I use a few pairs, to take my dog for a long run, for my motorcycling & airsofting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for motorcycles.
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. All the safety of motorcycle gloves without the bulk and the price. They feel sturdy, but light. 2 notes: They run a bit small.. I always wear medium, but the mediums are a bit tight (a chore to take off). They aren't for cold weather. Your hands WILL freeze.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Purely sucked.
customer_reviews.text: Had holes in multiple areas, not worth my twenty bucks, that's for dang sure.
customer_reviews.author: Couch, Noah

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the gloves is good, however
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these gloves for motorcycle riding. Size was right on. The quality of the gloves is good, however, I would not consider these to be motorcycle gloves. The knuckle protection is not a solid piece of plastic like a thought. I use them for MT. Biking instead and they work great. Decent protection with being bulky. I would recommend these for general use or MT biking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All purpose gloves
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gloves. I used them on a few 3-10 day field events during my last couple months in the army, I wear them when I ride my motorcycle, and I used them for a shooting competition. They seem to still be holding up pretty well, if they fall apart i'll just order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Spared my knuckles
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gloves for work. The hard knuckles are wonderful. Seems the knuckles are always the first thing scraped or banged up. Well these gloves protect them. They are very comfortable and the solid knuckle doesn't hinder use.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, good protection but still have good mobility. They also work well with my phone, no issues with the smart touch
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material - Lesser Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these almost a year ago and wanted another pair. The materials are clearly different in quality and the strap to pull the glove broke with the first pull. Pretty bummed because the first pair I got were amazing. I will say that the fit is good, and they are soft, but they aren't rugged enough for a motorcycle or work gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

product_meta.title: FREETOO Men Tactical Gloves with Knuckle Protection for Shooting Cycling and Heavy Duty Work (Desert)
feature_bullets: PERFECT PROTECTION: Reinforced palm and double stitching for heavy duty, protect hands from abrasion and cut. Durable PVC knuckles with inside padded to provide strong protection to your knuckle
SUPERIOR GRIP: Dual-layer synthetic leather palm featured by anti-skid gridding for adding grip capabilities on tactical activities, shooting and any heavy duty works with this airsoft gloves on

BREATHABLE COMFORT: This military gloves is achieved by odor-free breathable materials and functional vent design, comfortable to use in hot weather as well as in mild winter seasons for men women and youth

EASE OF MOVEMENT: This shooting gloves fit snugly into palm and all fingers, wrap tightly around wrist with adjustable wrist Velcro, not stiff, not bulky, maximum allow movement and dexterity in any outdoor activities
180-DAY REFUND/ REPLACEMENT POLICY: If you have any size issue or other problems with our knuckle tactical gloves, please feel free to contact FREETOO, a satisfied solution is promised
